name: Rudolph's Connection
description:
Rudolph wants to play a classic board game to connect four of his pieces together. Help him win as many games in a row! Collect coins every time you win to unlock new chips for Rudolph! Be careful though as the computer is very good at winning games! Connect your pieces vertically, horizontally, or diagonally. The computer will get harder after every level increases. How many levels can you complete before being defeated?

Rudolph’s Connection is a game for all ages and is a familiar fun game that anyone can play at any time. Don’t take the computer easy as it can trick you very easily. This version of Rudolph’s Connection includes an Improved AI and new art for you to enjoy. Get as far as you can and unlock all 6 skins for your game pieces. Collect them all and have fun!
